name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael John MONTROY, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael John MONTROY, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of August 2012, the Stay of Judgment of Allowance of Appeal and Petition for Appointment of New Counsel are DENIED. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
52 A.3d 1201
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent v. Michael John MONTROY, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 28, 2012.
